paper.title: Bisimulation Equivalence is Decidable for Basic Parallel Processes
paper.abstract: In a previous paper the authors proved the decidability of bisimulation equivalence over two subclasses of recursive processes involving a parallel composition operator, namely the so-called normed and live processes. In this paper, we extend this result to the whole class. The decidability proof permits us further to present a complete axiomatisation for this class of basic parallel processes. This result can be viewed as a proper extension of Milneru0027s complete axiomatisation of bisimulation equivalence on regular processes.
